entry.title: New release for wg-easy: v14.0.0
entry.content:
Home Assistent support, PASSWORD_HASH (inc. Helper), translation updates bugfixes & more.

Major changes

  • PASSWORD has been replaced by PASSWORD_HASH

Installation

See: https://github.com/wg-easy/wg-easy/pkgs/container/wg-easy/268405519?tag=14

Full Changelog: https://github.com/wg-easy/wg-easy/commits/v14.0.0
